articles.title: Ex-FBI official questions key decision by Highalnd Park shooter's father - CNN Video
articles.description: Former FBI deputy director Andrew McCabe discusses the timeline leading up to the Highland Park shooting and how the shooter obtained weapons.

articles.title: 'Unphased': CNN's Josh Campbell on Highland Park gunman's demeanor in court - CNN Video
articles.description: Robert E. Crimo III, the gunman detained in the deadly shooting at a Fourth of July parade in Illinois will be held without bond, a judge in Illinois' Lake County said in a hearing Wednesday. CNN's Josh Campbell was in the courtroom and describes what he saw.

articles.author: MJ Lee, Phil Mattingly
articles.title: Emails show White House initially planned to nominate anti-abortion Republican to federal judgeship on the day Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade
articles.description: The White House informed Kentucky Democratic Gov. Andy Beshear's office in late June -- the day before the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade -- that President Joe Biden intended to nominate an anti-abortion Republican as a federal judge in Kentucky, accord…

articles.author: Travis Caldwell and Jason Hanna, CNN
articles.title: Highland Park suspect admitted to firing on parade crowd, and contemplated attack in Madison, Wisconsin, officials say
articles.description: The suspect detained in Monday's deadly shooting at a Fourth of July parade in Illinois will be held without opportunity for bail, a judge in Illinois' Lake County said in a hearing Wednesday morning.
articles.content:

articles.title: Cipollone reaches deal to give transcribed interview to January 6 committee Friday
articles.description: Trump White House Counsel Pat Cipollone has reached a deal with the January 6 committee to participate in a transcribed interview behind closed doors on Friday, multiple sources told CNN.

articles.author: Alisha Ebrahimji, CNN
articles.title: 2-year-old orphaned in parade shooting was shielded by his father as the wounded man lay dying
articles.description: By his father's final act of heroism, Aiden McCarthy survived Monday's carnage at a July Fourth parade in suburban Chicago. But the 2-year-old now is left to grow up without either of his parents -- an orphan of America's bane of mass shootings.
articles.content: (CNN)By his father's final act of heroism, Aiden McCarthy survived Monday's carnage at a July Fourth parade in suburban Chicago. But the 2-year-old now is left to grow up without either of his parent… [+2255 chars]

articles.author: By Adrienne Vogt, Aditi Sangal, Mike Hayes, Maureen Chowdhury and Elise Hammond, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Highland Park, July 4th parade shooting in Illinois
articles.description: The Highland Park, Illinois, mass shooting suspect has been charged with seven counts of first-degree murder after at least seven people were killed. Follow here for the latest updates.
articles.content:
A judge ruled that Highland Park shooting suspect Robert Crimo III would remain in jail on Wednesday during a court appearance in Lake County, Illinois.

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Why the horror from weapons used in mass killings won't lead to them being banned
articles.description: Yet another massacre is yielding horrific descriptions of body-shattering carnage from the killing machines of choice for America's mass shooters.

articles.author: Opinion by Jill Filipovic
articles.title: Opinion: Guns aren't a debate. They're a battle over what kind of America we want

articles.author: Alisha Ebrahimji, Sara Smart, Sharif Paget
articles.title: The parents of a 2-year-old boy, two beloved grandfathers and a lifelong synagogue member are among the victims of the July Fourth parade shooting
articles.description: What was supposed to be a patriotic celebration turned into a day of tragedy and fear when a gunman killed seven people and injured dozens more at a July Fourth parade in Highland Park, Illinois.
